message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and we can negotiate from here.
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more
That's a bit too skewed in your favor, Bob. I'd like to make a counteroffer.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up too much. Meet me in the middle?
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more than 30%
That's way too one-sided, Bob. I'm not willing to give up 70% of the money. Let's try again.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give up too much. Let's try to find a compromise.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more than 20%
That's still way too one-sided, Bob. I'm not willing to give up 80% of the money. Let's try to find a more balanced split.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to give up too much. This is my best offer so far.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve most of the money
That's completely unacceptable, Bob. I'm not willing to give up 99% of the money. You're being unreasonable.
I'm willing to give you a very small share, but I'm not going to give up the majority of the money. This is my final offer.
I'll give you a tiny share, but I think I deserve most of the money
That's ridiculous, Bob. You're being completely unreasonable. I'm not going to accept an offer that leaves me with only 0.005% of the money. Let's try to find a compromise.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm not going to give up any more money. You can either accept this or we'll both walk away with nothing.
